name: Clean Marine AS
membership: We are memeber of EGCSA (Exhaust Gas Cleaning System Association) see www.egcsa.com
goal: Clean Marine AS is a corporation that design and build Exhaust Gas Cleaning Systems (EGCS) for the Maritime Industry. The patented Clean Marine EGCS is specifically designed to meet the needs of the maritime industry and offers proven Allstream exhaust gas handling. All exhaust sources on board can be served by one common EGCS unit, enabling a fast return on investment.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Regional Policy, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Environmental and operational initiatives, policies and legislation related to the maritime industry on EU Level as well as regional and local (e.g. port and estruaries) have our focus.
